info.author: LH
info.description:
This package provides class to control the GPIO on Olinuxino Maxi.
        Current release does no support any peripheral functions.
        
        Example
        =======
        
        Typical usage::
            
            #!/usr/bin/env python
        
            import IMX233_GPIO as GPIO
        
            #init module
            GPIO.init()
            
            #configure module
            GPIO.setcfg(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.OUT)
            GPIO.setcfg(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.IN)
                
            #read the current GPIO configuration
            config = GPIO.getcfg(GPIO.PIN#)
            
            #set GPIO high
            GPIO.output(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.HIGH)
            
            #set GPIO low
            GPIO.output(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.LOW)
            
            #read input
            state = GPIO.input(GPIO.PIN#)
            
            #cleanup 
            GPIO.cleanup()
            
        Warning
        =======
info.name: pyIMX233
info.html_description:
This package provides class to control the GPIO on Olinuxino Maxi.
Current release does no support any peripheral functions.

Example
=======

Typical usage::

#!/usr/bin/env python

import IMX233_GPIO as GPIO

#init module
GPIO.init()

#configure module
GPIO.setcfg(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setcfg(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.IN)

#read the current GPIO configuration
config = GPIO.getcfg(GPIO.PIN#)

#set GPIO high
GPIO.output(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.HIGH)

#set GPIO low
GPIO.output(GPIO.PIN#, GPIO.LOW)

#read input
state = GPIO.input(GPIO.PIN#)

#cleanup
GPIO.cleanup()

Warning
=======
